Can someone make non-magnetic docking port? I want a smoother more realistic docking procedure. I just hate the close is good enough approach with KSP docking. 

"A docking/berthing connection is referred to as either "soft" or "hard". Typically, a spacecraft first initiates a soft dock by making contact and latching its docking connector with that of the target vehicle. Once the soft connection is secured, if both spacecraft are pressurized, they may proceed to a hard dock where the docking mechanisms air-tightly seal together, enabling interior hatches to be safely opened so that crew and cargo can be transferred." ~ Wikipedia
